Join us on 9/22 for the 2019 ACLU-PA Pittsburgh Annual Meeting to learn more.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

"We have to uphold a free press and freedom of speech — because, in the end, lies and misinformation are no match for the truth." — Barack Obama

Join us on Sunday, September 22 for the Greater Pittsburgh Chapter Annual Meeting and hear about present-day attacks against the free press from two-time Pulitzer Prize finalist for Editorial Cartooning, Rob Rogers. In addition, ACLU-PA Executive Director Reggie Shuford will discuss our ongoing efforts to fight for justice and preserve liberty throughout our commonwealth.

Chapter Annual Meeting
